transcript_chunks.text: here are the five best backgrounds to choose in Starfield the soldier is sort of a warrior class which grants you improved stamina ballistic skills and boost pack training is probably the best recommendation for not only navigating a battlefield but traversing planets in general what I imagine will be a fan favorite choice at least is the choice I made is the Han solo-like space scoundrel it grants you pistol certification piloting expertise and persuasion so he can be well-rounded in those tough situations the combat medic will give you pistol skills along with good healing and health making you a formidable Force when it comes to Gunplay industrialists may sound corporate but the starting skills of this background are practical persuasion is always useful to avoid tough situations through dialogue and combining that with security expertise opens up a lot of options in your quest thou not found not only gives your character a mysterious origin it also gives you some basic skills that

dialogue and combining that with security expertise opens up a lot of options in your quest thou not found not only gives your character a mysterious origin it also gives you some basic skills that are Universal in your Starfield run if you're a big fan of another background let us know in the comments for now
